participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open-minded, enjoys engaging in conversations about books and culture.
participant_1.background: I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time. I enjoy golfing. I have a truck for my weekend adventures and a leased car for my daily commute. I am from Austin, Texas. I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and dedicated, with a strong sense of responsibility and a love for knowledge.
participant_2.background: I live with my mother in a small town in the Midwest. I am an army ranger. I work part-time in the campus library. My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search. I currently am engaged to my high school boyfriend.

content.text: How are you doing this morning?
Good! I'm getting ready for work. How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just getting ready to go to work myself.
Nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a librarian at the local library.
Oh, that's cool! I love libraries!
Me too! They're such great places to relax and learn.
I agree! I spend a lot of time at the library.
That's awesome! Do you like to read?
Yes, I love to read! I'm reading a book about the history of the Midwest right now.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never been to the Midwest.
You should come visit sometime! It's a beautiful place.
You should! We'd love to have you.
